(Effects that can trigger on turn 2 onward will not trigger again for 2 turns after triggering; using this skill has no effect on Special cooldown charge and unit does not gain EXP or SP.)<br><br>【Divine Vein (Ice)】<br>Applies the following status on space: Foes treat space as impassable terrain while status is active, but status is destructible (with 1 HP). (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out. Does not count as defensive terrain.
